title: Sociedade Patriótica, Económica, de Comércio, Agricultura, Ciências e Artes
original_title: Sociedade Patriótica, Económica, de Comércio, Agricultura, Ciências e Artes
body: It was created in Funchal in 1790, but we do not know how long it lasted. João José d'Orquigny (see this name) delivered a speech at the general assembly of the Patriotic Society when he bid farewell to it on July 1, 1790.

João José d'Orquigny: Delivered a speech at the general assembly
